head.supplied: 2/7/93 ¶ ¶ Because you probably do not yet have ¶ Medicago orbicularis ¶ in California, highly esteemed fellow-countryman, I am sending you fresh fruits of this important plant for meadow feed. You...

div.p: Bancroft Library, University of California, Berkeley, California.

Da Sie, hochgeehrter Herr Landsmann, wohl noch nicht in Californien die Medicago orbicularis haben, so sende ich Ihnen frische Früchte dieser wichtigen Pflanze für Wiesen-Futter. Ihre Vorträge in Deutschland sind sehr wichtig gewesen; auch bin ich stets erfreuet u belehrt durch Ihre Schriften aus der Anstalt in Berkeley. Brauchen Sie etwas besonderes von hier?

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva; line-height: 0.1945in; font-size: 10pt; text-align: end;

div.p: Because you probably do not yet have Medicago orbicularis in California, highly esteemed fellow-countryman, I am sending you fresh fruits of this important plant for meadow feed. Your lectures in Germany have been very important, I also am always pleased and informed by your writings from the institute in Berkeley. Do you need anything special from here?

p.style: font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; line-height: 0.1945in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;
font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; line-height: 0.1945in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;
